commits.sourceNew:
/** * Returns true iff compound file should be used for * IndexDocValues, otherwise false. The default is * true. *

* NOTE: To change the default value you need to subclass a {@link Codec} with * a distinct name since this value is final and should not be changed to * prevent the risk of a index corruption. This setting is private to a * {@link Codec}. If you intend to change this value on an existing * {@link Codec} re-indexing is required. * * @return true iff compound file should be used for * IndexDocValues, otherwise false. */ public boolean getDocValuesUseCFS() { return dvUseCompoundFile; }

commits.author: Robert Muir

/** * Returns true iff compound file should be used for * IndexDocValues, otherwise false. The default is * true. *

* NOTE: To change the default value you need to subclass a {@link Codec} with * a distinct name since this value is final and should not be changed to * prevent the risk of a index corruption. This setting is private to a * {@link Codec}. If you intend to change this value on an existing * {@link Codec} re-indexing is required. * * @return true iff compound file should be used for * IndexDocValues, otherwise false. */ public boolean getDocValuesUseCFS() { return dvUseCompoundFile; }
